ShortDescription.Value: This mod let you import custom surfaces and custom decals.

Publish.LongDescription:
# ExtraAssetsImporter This mod let you import custom surfaces, custom decals and custom NetLanes made of decals.
#### I'm recommending you to read this page on the website not in game, the game doesn't support all the formatting the web page does.
# CUSTOM ASSETS AREN'T SUPPORTED BY THE GAME YET. The assets are safe and stable to use, and won't cause any crashes or bugs. Whilst we don't expect our asset mods to break on official asset support, all modding (and unofficial modding) will always have some risk associated with it. We will do our best to ensure the transition is as smooth as possible when editor is released. When editor is released I will depcreciate this mod (but keep active for a while) and republish the assets using official pipeline.
### I'm recommending you to read this page on the website not in game, the game doesn't support all the formatting the web page does.
You can see the trailer video made by Sully in the "MORE ABOUT THIS MOD" section.
# About the screenshot - FewCandy's farm, you can find the full video about this build [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z_Fp8JWzQXg). - CloverPie's abandoned rail yard, you can find the full video of this build [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gOj35sN7DI8).
# Recommended Assets Pack ## By Sully: - [Golden Sand Beaches 512px and 1k Texture Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80864/Windows), for 4k you can find it in [this Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1024242828114673724/1239332949657391175), - [Riverbeds Texture Pack 512px and 1k](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80758/Windows), for 4k you can find it in [this Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1024242828114673724/1239330193764778065), - [White Sand Beaches 512px and 1k Texture Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80867/Windows), for 4k you can find it in [this Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1024242828114673724/1239334472868954174), - [Cracks and Damage Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80583/Windows), - [Sea Foam Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80585/Windows), - [Stains and Leakage Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80584/Windows), - [Extra3.0 Graffiti Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80578/Windows), - [Cities Skylines II Graffiti Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80582/Windows) ## By Tigon: - [Road Markings - Words and Symbols Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80537/Windows), - [Road Markings - Lines and Arrows Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80534/Windows), - [Letters and Numbers Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80536/Windows), - [Ground Texture Decal Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80538/Windows), - [Extra Team Graffiti](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80540/Windows), - [Autobahn Letters and Numbers](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80539/Windows), ## By Dome: - [Italian Posters By Dome](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80580/Windows), - [Billboard Ads By Dome](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80570/Windows), ## By Triton Supreme: - [Content Creator Poster Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80547/Windows), - [EAI - Surface Pack](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80530/Windows), ## By Bruceyboy24804: - [BritishBrandsPack01](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/80541/Windows),
# Translation ⚠️ This mod uses crowdin so there maybe inconsistencies with translations due to translations from different translators ⚠️ - ⚠️French 66% : aricoseco, Edou24, Triton Supreme, Morgan Touverey Quilling (mtouverey) - ✔️Chinese Simplified 100% : RilkeXS(无手文) (RilkeXS), baka-gourd, 一叶杳舟 (Yao_Zhou), boan51204, Kelvin Ong (kelvinspaces) - ⚠️Chinese Traditional 66% : Tiger Zhang (tiger42231), Source Design (source_design), Kelvin Ong (kelvinspaces), nd381 - ⚠️German 66% : Konsi, Fuchs23 - ⚠️Italian 16% : Stefano (Furios) - ⚠️Japanese 47% : nd381 - ⚠️Korean 66% : Hinanchovo - ✔️Polish 100% : Lisek, karmel68 - ⚠️Portuguese 62% -> [European Portuguese Localization mod](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/92599/Windows) - ⚠️Portuguese, Brazilian 50% : TiZedoGrelo, Miguel Pereira Campos (mpcamposz), davi (dvzz) - ⚠️Russian 20% : Mihail (kaktyc), Lek0ms, MrSandcraft - ✔️Spanish 100% : elGendo87
Publish.ChangeLog: ### Improvements - New Importers (BETA) > - New importers are now in Beta. > - You can enable or disable the new importers in the EAI settings. > - You can now create an asset with only one texture — it can be a NormalMap, a MaskMap, or a BaseColorMap. > - This fixes the pink normal map issue for surfaces. > - Possibility to have an AssetPack filter in-game. > - Possibility to have localization for assets. > - Unified the JSON files (`Prefab.json` and `Material.json`) for every asset. > - Added support for components. > - EAI can now create default JSON files for every importer. > - [Texture Sharing](https://github.com/AlphaGaming7780/ExtraAssetsImporter/wiki/%5BNEW%5D-Texture-Sharing) > - Surface textures are now saved in the database. > - Surface textures are now BC-compressed (like Decals and NetLanes). ### Fixes: - For new importers > - Various fixes. ### Translations: - ✔️ Chinese (Simplified) 100%: RilkeXS (无手文) - ✔️ Polish 100%: karmel68 - ✔️ Spanish 100%: elGendo87
